rooms.description: Welcoming space with ample lighting and accessibility features including ramps for wheelchair movement, and Vastu-aligned entrance.
Spacious living room with floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring natural light. Designed to be open plan with easy access from the entrance hall, incorporating Vastu principles for energy flow.
Dedicated dining space adjacent to the living room, featuring wheelchair accessible design and sufficient natural light.

Fully functional kitchen with open-plan connectivity to the dining area, including floor-to-ceiling windows for ample daylight. Layout considers Vastu guidelines by positioning in the north-eastern section.

openings.description: Wheelchair-accessible entrance with ramp and automatic door system.
Floor-to-ceiling window ensuring ample natural light according to Vastu design principles.
Large window providing ventilation and natural light as per Vastu norms.
